All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
ResourcesUtilizationRecord
A class for creating timestamped records of the resources utilization for the data center as a whole.
TimeStatsTableBuilder
A class for calculating the Min, Avg, Max, Variance, and Stddev statistics on a list of values.
TracesBatchesManager
A class for handling the dynamic submission of VM requests to the DatacenterBroker.
TracesParser
A parser for parsing the AzureTracesForPacking2020 dataset and other datasets that follow the same schema.
TracesSimulationManager
A class for facilitating the trace-based simulations by keeping all the configuration parameters in a single place.
TracesStatisticsManager
A class for facilitating the statistics/traces collection by keeping all the measurements in a single place.
VmAllocationPolicyBestFitWithPlacementGroups
An extension of the VmAllocationPolicyBestFit that supports requests with VmPlacementGroups.
VmAllocationPolicyBestFitWithPlacementGroups_LRRL
An extension of the VmAllocationPolicyBestFitWithPlacementGroups that uses the left-to-right and right-to-left concepts depending on the number VMs of the VmPlacementGroup that is requested to be placed.
VmAllocationPolicyChicSchedAllPack
An extension of the VmAllocationPolicyBestFitWithPlacementGroups that implements an all-pack configuration of the topology-aware Chic-sched scheduler published in [1].
VmAllocationPolicyFirstFitWithPlacementGroups
An extension of the VmAllocationPolicyBestFitWithPlacementGroups that places the individual VMs of a group request according to First Fit algorithm instead of Best Fit.
VmAllocationPolicyRequestStatus
An enumerator with the possible statuses a request can take after being processed by the VM placement group allocation policies.
VmAllocationPolicyRequestType
An enumerator with the request types that are supported by the VM placement group allocation policies.
VmAllocationPolicyTraceRecord
A class for creating records of how the VM requests are handled by the VM placement group allocation policies (see VmAllocationPolicyRequestType).
VmAllocationPolicyTraceTableBuilder
A class for creating trace files with VmAllocationPolicyTraceRecord.
VmAllocationPolicyWithPlacementGroups
An enumerator with the supported VM placement group allocation policies.
VmPlacementGroup
A VmPlacementGroup is a group of VMs that is requested to be placed according to a set of rules/constrains that take into account the topology of the system.
VmPlacementGroupAffinityType
An enumerator for the affinity type of a VmPlacementGroup.
VmPlacementGroupEnforcement
An enumerator for the enforcement of the placement rules for a VmPlacementGroup.
VmPlacementGroupScope
An enumerator for the scope of a VmPlacementGroup.
VmPlacementGroupsWithAzureTraces
An example of how to run simulations with VmPlacementGroup requests and trace files from the AzureTracesForPacking2020 dataset.
VmRecord
Class representing a VM record.
VmTypeRecord
Class representing a VM type record.
VmTypeRecordsTableBuilder
A class for creating histograms about the VM types, i.e., VmTypeRecord.
